message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a great opportunity for you to own this valuable item. As we start our negotiation, I'd like to make an initial offer of $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your initial offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm still looking to get a better price for the product. Considering its value to you, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering a counteroffer of $850000. I believe this is a fair compromise that benefits both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to compromise further. I'm offering a counteroffer of $775000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I understand your desire to get a good deal, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $775000. Considering the product's value to you, I'm willing to make another counteroffer. I'm offering a price of $825000. I believe this is a fair compromise that takes into account your willingness to compromise.

I appreciate your willingness to make another counteroffer, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to compromise further. I'm offering a counteroffer of $790000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
